00089 void PatchData::get_minmax_element_unsigned_area(double& min, double& max, MsqError &err)
00090 {
00091   if (!have_computed_info(MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA) ||
00092       !have_computed_info(MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA))
00093   {
00094     max=0;
00095     min=MSQ_DBL_MAX;
00096     size_t count = num_elements();
00097     for (size_t i=0; i<count; ++i) {
00098       double vol;
00099       assert( i<elementArray.size() );
00100       vol = elementArray[i].compute_unsigned_area(*this, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00101       if (vol > max)
00102         max = vol;
00103       if (vol < min)
00104         min = vol;
00105     }
00106     note_have_info(MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA);
00107     note_have_info(MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA);
00108     computedInfos[MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA] = max;
00109     computedInfos[MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA] = min;
00110   }
00111   else
00112   {
00113     max = computedInfos[MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA];
00114     min = computedInfos[MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA];
00115   }
00116     
00117   if (max <= 0 || min < 0 || min == MSQ_DBL_MAX)
00118     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00119 }
00120 
00121 void PatchData::get_minmax_edge_length(double& min, double& max) const
00122 {
00123   min = HUGE_VAL;
00124   max = -HUGE_VAL;
00125   
00126   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elements(); ++i) {
00127     const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(i);
00128     const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00129     const unsigned num_edges = TopologyInfo::edges( elem.get_element_type() );
00130     for (unsigned e = 0; e < num_edges; ++e) {
00131       const unsigned* edge = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( elem.get_element_type(), e );
00132       const double len_sqr = (vertex_by_index(conn[edge[0]]) - 
00133                               vertex_by_index(conn[edge[1]])).length_squared();
00134       if (len_sqr < min)
00135         min = len_sqr;
00136       if (len_sqr > max)
00137         max = len_sqr;
00138     }
00139   }
00140   min = sqrt(min);
00141   max = sqrt(max);
00142 }

00176 
00183 void PatchData::reorder()
00184 {
00185   size_t i, j;
00186   const size_t num_vertex = num_nodes();
00187   const size_t num_elem = num_elements();
00188 
00189   // Step 1: Clear any cached data that will be invalidated by this
00190   vertexNormalIndices.clear();
00191   normalData.clear();
00192   //vertexDomainDOF.clear();
00193 
00194   // Step 2: Make sure we have vertex-to-element adjacencies
00195   if (!vertAdjacencyArray.size())
00196     generate_vertex_to_element_data();
00197   
00198   // Step 3: Do breadth-first search
00199   std::vector<bool> visited( num_vertex, false );
00200   std::vector<size_t> vertex_order( num_vertex );
00201   std::vector<size_t>::iterator q1_beg, q1_end, q2_end;
00202   q1_beg = q1_end = q2_end = vertex_order.begin();
00203   // Outer loop will be done once for each disconnected chunk of mesh.
00204   while (q1_beg != vertex_order.end())
00205   {
00206       // Find vertex furthest from the origin
00207     double max = -1.0;
00208     size_t vtx_idx = num_vertex;
00209     for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
00210       if (!visited[i]) 
00211       {
00212         double dist = vertexArray[i].length_squared();
00213         if (dist > max)
00214         {
00215           max = dist;
00216           vtx_idx = i;
00217         }
00218       }
00219     assert( vtx_idx < num_vertex);
00220     
00221     *q2_end++ = vtx_idx;;
00222     visited[vtx_idx] = true;
00223     do {
00224       q1_end = q2_end;
00225       for ( ; q1_beg != q1_end; ++q1_beg)
00226       {
00227         size_t vtx_adj_offset = vertAdjacencyOffsets[*q1_beg];
00228         size_t vtx_adj_end    = vertAdjacencyOffsets[*q1_beg + 1];
00229         for (i = vtx_adj_offset; i < vtx_adj_end; ++i)
00230         {
00231           size_t elem = vertAdjacencyArray[i];
00232           assert( elem < elementArray.size() );
00233           size_t num_elem_verts = elementArray[elem].node_count();
00234           size_t* elem_verts = elementArray[elem].get_vertex_index_array();
00235           for (j = 0; j < num_elem_verts; ++j)
00236           {
00237             size_t elem_vert = elem_verts[j];
00238             if (!visited[elem_vert])
00239             {
00240               *q2_end++ = elem_vert;;
00241               visited[elem_vert] = true;
00242             }
00243           }
00244         }
00245       }
00246     } while (q2_end != q1_end);
00247   }
00248   
00249     // Step 4: vertex_order contains the list of current vertex indices
00250     //         in the opposite of the order that they will occur in the 
00251     //         reorderd patch.  The following code will construct veretx_map
00252     //         from vertex_order with the following properties
00253     //         - vertex_map will be indexed by the current vertex index and
00254     //           contain the new index of that vertex (inverse of vertex_order)
00255     //         - the vertices will be grouped by their free/slave/fixed flag.
00256   std::vector<size_t> vertex_map( num_vertex );
00257   const size_t fixed_vtx_offset = numFreeVertices + numSlaveVertices;
00258   size_t free_idx = 0, slave_idx = numFreeVertices, fixed_idx = fixed_vtx_offset;
00259   for (i = 1; i <= num_vertex; ++i)
00260   {
00261     size_t vtx_idx = vertex_order[num_vertex - i];
00262     if (vtx_idx < numFreeVertices) 
00263       vertex_map[vtx_idx] = free_idx++;
00264     else if(vtx_idx < fixed_vtx_offset)
00265       vertex_map[vtx_idx] = slave_idx++;
00266     else
00267       vertex_map[vtx_idx] = fixed_idx++;
00268   }
00269     // make sure everything adds up
00270   assert( free_idx == numFreeVertices );
00271   assert( slave_idx == fixed_vtx_offset );
00272   assert( fixed_idx == num_vertex );
00273 
00274 
00275     // Step 5: compute element permutation
00276     // initialize all to "num_elem" to indicate unvisited
00277   std::vector<size_t> element_map( num_elem, num_elem );  
00278   size_t elem_idx = 0;
00279   for (i = 1; i <= num_vertex; ++i) 
00280   {
00281     size_t vtx_idx = vertex_order[num_vertex - i];
00282     size_t vtx_adj_offset = vertAdjacencyOffsets[vtx_idx];
00283     size_t vtx_adj_end    = vertAdjacencyOffsets[vtx_idx + 1];
00284     for (j = vtx_adj_offset; j < vtx_adj_end; ++j)
00285     {
00286       size_t elem = vertAdjacencyArray[j];
00287       if (element_map[elem] == num_elem)
00288         element_map[elem] = elem_idx++;
00289     }
00290   }
00291     // make sure everything adds up
00292   assert( elem_idx == num_elem );
00293 
00294   // Step 6:  Permute the vertices
00295   std::vector<MsqVertex> new_vertex_array(num_vertex);
00296   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> new_vtx_handle_array(num_vertex);
00297   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i) {
00298     size_t new_idx = vertex_map[i];
00299     new_vertex_array[new_idx] = vertexArray[i];
00300     new_vtx_handle_array[new_idx] = vertexHandlesArray[i];
00301   }
00302   vertexArray.swap(new_vertex_array);
00303   vertexHandlesArray.swap(new_vtx_handle_array);
00304 
00305   // Step 7: Permute the elements and vertex indices for the elements
00306   std::vector<MsqMeshEntity> new_elem_array(num_elem);
00307   std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle> new_elem_handle_array(num_elem);
00308   for (i = 0; i < num_elem; ++i) {
00309     assert( i < elementArray.size() );
00310     size_t  vert_count = elementArray[i].node_count();
00311     size_t* conn_array = elementArray[i].get_vertex_index_array();
00312     for (j = 0; j < vert_count; ++j) {
00313       conn_array[j] = vertex_map[conn_array[j]];
00314     }
00315 
00316     size_t new_idx = element_map[i];
00317     assert(new_idx < num_elem);
00318     new_elem_array[new_idx] = elementArray[i];
00319     new_elem_handle_array[new_idx] = elementHandlesArray[i];
00320   }
00321   elementArray.swap( new_elem_array );
00322   elementHandlesArray.swap( new_elem_handle_array );
00323 
00324   // Step 8: Clear no-longer-valid vertex-to-element adjacency info.
00325   if (vertAdjacencyOffsets.size()) {
00326     vertAdjacencyOffsets.clear();
00327     vertAdjacencyArray.clear();
00328     generate_vertex_to_element_data();
00329   }
00330   
00331   notify_new_patch( ); 
00332 }

00334 
00355 void PatchData::move_free_vertices_constrained(Vector3D dk[], size_t nb_vtx,
00356                                                double step_size, MsqError &err)
00357 {
00358   if (nb_vtx != num_free_vertices())
00359   {
00360     MSQ_SETERR(err)("The directional vector must be of length numVertices.",
00361                     MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00362     return;
00363   }
00364   
00365   size_t i;
00366   for (i = 0; i < num_free_vertices(); ++i) 
00367   {
00368     vertexArray[i] += (step_size * dk[i]);
00369     snap_vertex_to_domain(i, err);
00370     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00371   }
00372   
00373   if (numSlaveVertices) {
00374     update_slave_node_coordinates( err );
00375     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00376   }
00377 }
00378 
00379 
00395 void PatchData::set_free_vertices_constrained(PatchDataVerticesMemento* memento,
00396                                               Vector3D dk[],
00397                                               size_t nb_vtx,
00398                                               double step_size,
00399                                               MsqError &err)
00400 {
00401   if (memento->originator != this || nb_vtx != num_free_vertices())
00402   {
00403     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00404     return;
00405   }
00406   
00407   size_t i;
00408   for (i = 0; i < num_free_vertices(); ++i) 
00409   {
00410     vertexArray[i] = memento->vertices[i] + (step_size * dk[i]);
00411     snap_vertex_to_domain(i, err);
00412     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00413   }
00414   
00415   if (numSlaveVertices) {
00416     update_slave_node_coordinates( err );
00417     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00418   }
00419   
00420     // Checks that moving direction is zero for fixed vertices.
00421   if (MSQ_DBG(3)) {
00422   for (i = 0; i < num_nodes(); ++i) {
00423     if (dk[i].length_squared() != 0.0)
00424     {
00425       MSQ_DBGOUT(3) << "dk["<<i<<"]: " << dk[i] << endl;
00426       MSQ_DBGOUT(3) << "moving a fixed vertex." << endl;
00427     }
00428   }     
00429   }
00430 }
00431 
00432 static void project_to_plane( Vector3D& vect, const Vector3D& norm )
00433 {
00434   double len_sqr = norm % norm;
00435   if (len_sqr > DBL_EPSILON) 
00436     vect -= norm * ((norm % vect) / len_sqr);
00437 }
00438 
00439 void PatchData::project_gradient( std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient, MsqError& err )
00440 {
00441   if (!domain_set())
00442     return;
00443   
00444   if (gradient.size() != num_free_vertices()) {
00445     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
00446     return;
00447   }
00448   
00449   if (normalData.empty()) {
00450     update_cached_normals( err );
00451     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00452   }
00453   
00454   Vector3D norm;
00455   for (size_t i= 0; i < num_free_vertices(); ++i) {
00456     if (vertexNormalIndices.empty()) {  // whole mesh on single 2D domain
00457       norm = normalData[i];
00458       project_to_plane( gradient[i], norm );
00459     }
00460     else if (vertexDomainDOF[i] == 2) { // vertex on surface
00461       norm = normalData[vertexNormalIndices[i]];
00462       project_to_plane( gradient[i], norm );
00463     }
00464     else if (vertexDomainDOF[i] == 1) {
00465       size_t j, num_elem;
00466       const size_t* elems = get_vertex_element_adjacencies( i, num_elem, err );
00467       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00468       for (j = 0; j < num_elem; ++j) {
00469         if (2 == TopologyInfo::dimension(element_by_index(elems[j]).get_element_type())) {
00470           norm = vertexArray[i];
00471           get_domain()->element_normal_at( elementHandlesArray[elems[j]], norm );
00472           project_to_plane( gradient[i], norm );
00473         }
00474       }
00475     }
00476   }
00477 }

00479 
00489 double PatchData::get_max_vertex_movement_squared(PatchDataVerticesMemento*
00490                                                   memento,
00491                                                   MsqError &err)
00492 {
00493   double max_dist = 0.0;
00494   for (size_t i = 0; i < memento->vertices.size(); ++i) {
00495     double temp_dist = (vertexArray[i] - memento->vertices[i]).length_squared();
00496     if (temp_dist > max_dist)
00497       max_dist = temp_dist;
00498   }
00499   return max_dist;
00500 }

00534 void PatchData::get_element_vertex_coordinates(
00535   size_t elem_index,
00536   std::vector<Vector3D> &coords,
00537   MsqError& /*err*/)
00538 {
00539     // Check index
00540   if (elem_index >= num_elements())
00541     return;
00542   
00543     // Ask the element for its vertex indices
00544   assert( elem_index < elementArray.size() );
00545   const size_t *vertex_indices = elementArray[elem_index].get_vertex_index_array();
00546   
00547     // Get the coords for each indicated vertex
00548   size_t num_verts = elementArray[elem_index].vertex_count();
00549   coords.reserve(coords.size() + num_verts);
00550   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_verts; i++)
00551     coords.push_back(Vector3D(vertexArray[vertex_indices[i]]));
00552 }

00560   size_t elem_index,
00561   std::vector<size_t> &vertex_indices,

00564     // Ask the element for its vertex indices
00565   assert( elem_index < elementArray.size() );
00566   elementArray[elem_index].get_vertex_indices(vertex_indices);
00567 }

00569 
00570 void PatchData::get_vertex_element_indices(size_t vertex_index,
00571                                            std::vector<size_t> &elem_indices,
00572                                            MsqError &err) 
00573 {
00574   size_t count;
00575   const size_t *ptr;
00576   ptr = get_vertex_element_adjacencies( vertex_index, count, err );
00577   elem_indices.resize( count );
00578   std::copy( ptr, ptr + count, elem_indices.begin() );
00579 }
00580 
00581 void PatchData::get_vertex_element_indices(size_t vertex_index,
00582                                            unsigned element_dimension,
00583                                            std::vector<size_t> &elem_indices,
00584                                            MsqError &err) 
00585 {
00586   elem_indices.clear();
00587   size_t count;
00588   const size_t *ptr;
00589   ptr = get_vertex_element_adjacencies( vertex_index, count, err );
00590   for (const size_t* const end = ptr + count; ptr != end; ++ptr)
00591   {
00592     assert(*ptr < elementArray.size());
00593     const EntityTopology type = elementArray[*ptr].get_element_type();
00594     const unsigned dim = TopologyInfo::dimension( type );
00595     if (dim == element_dimension) 
00596       elem_indices.push_back( *ptr );
00597   }
00598 }
00599 
00600 const size_t* PatchData::get_vertex_element_adjacencies( size_t vertex_index,
00601                                                          size_t& array_len_out,
00602                                                          MsqError& err )
00603 {
00604     // Make sure we've got the data
00605   if (vertAdjacencyArray.empty())
00606   {
00607     generate_vertex_to_element_data();
00608   }
00609   
00610   const size_t begin = vertAdjacencyOffsets[vertex_index];
00611   const size_t end = vertAdjacencyOffsets[vertex_index+1];
00612   array_len_out = end - begin;
00613   return &vertAdjacencyArray[begin];
00614 }
00615 
00616 
00625 void PatchData::get_adjacent_vertex_indices(size_t vertex_index,
00626                                             std::vector<size_t> &vert_indices,
00627                                             MsqError &err) const
00628 {
00629   bitMap.clear();
00630   bitMap.resize( num_nodes(), false );
00631   
00632   const size_t *conn;
00633   size_t conn_idx, curr_vtx_idx;
00634   const unsigned* adj;
00635   unsigned num_adj, i;
00636   std::vector<MsqMeshEntity>::const_iterator e;
00637   for (e = elementArray.begin(); e != elementArray.end(); ++e) {
00638     conn = e->get_vertex_index_array();
00639     conn_idx = std::find( conn, conn + e->node_count(), vertex_index ) - conn;
00640     if (conn_idx == e->node_count())
00641       continue;
00642     
00643       // If a higher-order node, return corners of side/face
00644       // that node is in the center of.
00645     EntityTopology type = e->get_element_type();
00646     if (conn_idx >= TopologyInfo::corners(type)) {
00647       unsigned dim, id;
00648       TopologyInfo::side_from_higher_order( type, e->node_count(), conn_idx,
00649                                             dim, id, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00650       adj = TopologyInfo::side_vertices( type, dim, id, num_adj );
00651     }
00652     else {
00653       adj = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( e->get_element_type(), conn_idx, num_adj );
00654     }
00655     for (i = 0; i < num_adj; ++i) {
00656       curr_vtx_idx = conn[ adj[i] ]; // get index into patch vertex list
00657       if (!bitMap[curr_vtx_idx]) {
00658         vert_indices.push_back( curr_vtx_idx );
00659         bitMap[curr_vtx_idx] = true;
00660       }
00661     }
00662   }
00663 }
00664 
00676 void PatchData::get_adjacent_entities_via_n_dim(int n, size_t ent_ind,
00677                                                 std::vector<size_t> &adj_ents,
00678                                                 MsqError &err)
00679 {
00680   //reset the vector
00681   adj_ents.clear();
00682     //vertices of this entity (given by ent_ind)
00683   vector<size_t> verts;
00684     //vector to store elements attached to the vertices in verts
00685   vector<size_t> elem_on_vert[MSQ_MAX_NUM_VERT_PER_ENT];
00686     //length of above vectos
00687   int length_elem_on_vert[MSQ_MAX_NUM_VERT_PER_ENT];
00688     //get verts on this element
00689   get_element_vertex_indices(ent_ind, verts, err);
00690   int num_vert=verts.size();
00691   int i=0;
00692   int j=0;
00693   for(i=0;i<num_vert;++i){
00694       //get elements on the vertices in verts and the number of vertices
00695     get_vertex_element_indices(verts[i],elem_on_vert[i],err);
00696     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00697     length_elem_on_vert[i]=elem_on_vert[i].size();
00698   }
00699     //this_ent is the index for an entity which is a candidate to be placed
00700     //into adj_ents
00701   size_t this_ent;
00702     //num of times this_ent has been found in the vectors of entity indices
00703   int counter=0;
00704   i = 0;
00705     //loop of each vert on ent_ind
00706   while(i<num_vert){
00707       //loop over each ent connected to vert
00708     j=0;
00709     while(j<length_elem_on_vert[i]){
00710         //get candidate element
00711       this_ent=elem_on_vert[i][j];
00712         //if we haven't already consider this ent
00713       if(this_ent!=ent_ind){
00714           //if this_ent occurred earlier we would have already considered it
00715           //so start at i and j+1
00716         int k1=i;
00717         int k2=j+1;
00718           //this_ent has occured once so far
00719         counter=1;
00720           //while k1 < num_vert
00721         while(k1<num_vert){
00722             //loop over entries in the elem on vert vector
00723           while(k2<length_elem_on_vert[k1]){
00724               //if it matches this_ent
00725             if(elem_on_vert[k1][k2]==this_ent){
00726                 //mark it as 'seen', by making it the same as ent_ind
00727                 //i.e., the entity  passed to us.
00728               elem_on_vert[k1][k2]=ent_ind;
00729               ++counter;
00730                 //do not look at remaining elems in this vector
00731               k2+=length_elem_on_vert[k1];
00732             }
00733             else
00734               ++k2;
00735           }
00736           ++k1;
00737           k2=0;
00738           
00739         }
00740           //if this_ent occured enough times and isn't ent_ind
00741         if(counter>n && this_ent!=ent_ind){
00742           adj_ents.push_back(this_ent);
00743         }
00744       }
00745       ++j;
00746     }
00747     ++i;
00748   }
00749 }
00750 
00751     
00752   
00753 
00754 
00761 void PatchData::update_mesh(MsqError &err, const TagHandle* tag)
00762 {
00763   if (!myMesh) {
00764     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot update mesh on temporary patch.\n", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00765     return;
00766   }
00767   
00768   const size_t not_fixed = numFreeVertices + numSlaveVertices;
00769   if (tag) {
00770     for (size_t i = 0; i < not_fixed; ++i) {
00771       myMesh->tag_set_vertex_data( *tag, 1, &vertexHandlesArray[i], 
00772                                    vertexArray[i].to_array(), err );
00773                                    MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00774     }
00775   }
00776   else {
00777     for (size_t i = 0; i < not_fixed; ++i) {
00778       myMesh->vertex_set_coordinates( vertexHandlesArray[i],
00779                                       vertexArray[i],
00780                                       err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00781     }      
00782   }
00783   
00784   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertexArray.size(); ++i)
00785   {
00786     myMesh->vertex_set_byte( vertexHandlesArray[i],
00787                              vertexArray[i].get_flags(),
00788                              err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00789   }
00790 }
00791 
00792 void PatchData::update_slave_node_coordinates( MsqError& err )
00793 {
00794     // update slave vertices
00795   if (0 == num_slave_vertices())
00796     return;
00797 
00798     // Set a mark on every slave vertex.  We'll clear the marks as we
00799     // set the vertex coordinates.  This way we can check that all 
00800     // vertices got updated.
00801   const size_t vert_end = num_free_vertices() + num_slave_vertices();
00802   for (size_t i = num_free_vertices(); i < vert_end; ++i)
00803     vertexArray[i].flags() |= MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00804   
00805     // For each element, calculate slave vertex coordinates from
00806     // mapping function.
00807   const int ARR_SIZE = 27;
00808   double coeff[ARR_SIZE];
00809   size_t index[ARR_SIZE];
00810   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elements(); ++i) {
00811     MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(i);
00812     const int num_corner = elem.vertex_count();
00813     const int num_node = elem.node_count();
00814     assert(num_node < ARR_SIZE);
00815   
00816     const EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00817     const MappingFunction* const mf = get_mapping_function( type );
00818     if (0 == mf || num_node == num_corner)
00819       continue;
00820       
00821     const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00822 
00823       // for each higher-order non-slave node, set bit indicating
00824       // that mapping function is a function of the non-slave node
00825       // coordinates
00826     NodeSet ho_bits = non_slave_node_set( i );
00827     
00828       // for each higher-order slave node
00829     for (int k = num_corner; k < num_node; ++k) {
00830       if (!is_vertex_slave(conn[k]))
00831         continue;
00832       
00833         // check if we already did this one for an adjacent element
00834       MsqVertex& vert = vertexArray[conn[k]];
00835       if (!vert.is_flag_set(MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK))
00836         continue;
00837      
00838         // what is this node a mid node of (i.e. face 1, edge 2, etc.)
00839       Sample loc = TopologyInfo::sample_from_node( type, elem.node_count(), 
00840                                                    k, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00841       
00842         // evaluate mapping function at logical loction of HO node.
00843       size_t num_coeff;
00844       mf->coefficients( loc, ho_bits, coeff, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00845       mf->convert_connectivity_indices( num_node, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00846       
00847         // calulate new coordinates for slave node
00848       assert( num_coeff > 0 );
00849       vert = coeff[0] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[0]] );
00850       for (size_t j = 1; j < num_coeff; ++j)
00851         vert += coeff[j] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[j]] );
00852       
00853         // clear mark
00854       vert.flags() &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00855     }
00856   }
00857   
00858     // make sure we set the coordinates for every slave node
00859   for (size_t i = num_free_vertices(); i < vert_end; ++i) {
00860     if (vertex_by_index(i).is_flag_set(MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK)) {
00861       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_MESH, 
00862        "No element with mapping function adjacent to slave vertex %lu (%lu)\n",
00863        (unsigned long)i, (unsigned long)get_vertex_handles_array()[i]);
00864         // make sure we finish with all marks cleared
00865       vertexArray[i].flags() &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00866     }
00867   }
00868   
00869     // snap vertices to domain
00870   if (domain_set()) {
00871     for (size_t i = num_free_vertices(); i < vert_end; ++i) {
00872       snap_vertex_to_domain(i, err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00873     }
00874   } 
00875 }
00876 
00877 void PatchData::update_slave_node_coordinates( const size_t* elements,
00878                                                size_t num_elems,
00879                                                MsqError& err )
00880 {
00881     // update slave vertices
00882   if (0 == num_slave_vertices())
00883     return;
00884   
00885     // set a mark on each vertex so we don't update shared
00886     // vertices more than once.
00887   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elems; ++i) {
00888     MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(elements[i]);
00889     const int num_corner = elem.vertex_count();
00890     const int num_node = elem.node_count();
00891     const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00892     for (int j = num_corner; j < num_node; ++j)
00893       vertexArray[conn[j]].flags() |= MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00894   }
00895   
00896     // For each element, calculate slave vertex coordinates from
00897     // mapping function.
00898   const int ARR_SIZE = 27;
00899   double coeff[ARR_SIZE];
00900   size_t index[ARR_SIZE];
00901   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elems; ++i) {
00902     MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(elements[i]);
00903     const int num_corner = elem.vertex_count();
00904     const int num_node = elem.node_count();
00905     assert(num_node < ARR_SIZE);
00906   
00907     const EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00908     const MappingFunction* const mf = get_mapping_function( type );
00909     if (0 == mf || num_node == num_corner)
00910       continue;
00911       
00912     const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00913 
00914       // for each higher-order non-slave node, set bit indicating
00915       // that mapping function is a function of the non-slave node
00916       // coordinates
00917     NodeSet ho_bits = non_slave_node_set( i );
00918     
00919       // for each higher-order slave node
00920     for (int k = num_corner; k < num_node; ++k) {
00921       if (!is_vertex_slave(conn[k]))
00922         continue;
00923       
00924         // check if we already did this one for an adjacent element
00925       MsqVertex& vert = vertexArray[conn[k]];
00926       if (!vert.is_flag_set(MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK))
00927         continue;
00928      
00929         // what is this node a mid node of (i.e. face 1, edge 2, etc.)
00930       Sample loc = TopologyInfo::sample_from_node( type, elem.node_count(), 
00931                                                    k, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00932       
00933         // evaluate mapping function at logical loction of HO node.
00934       size_t num_coeff;
00935       mf->coefficients( loc, ho_bits, coeff, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00936       mf->convert_connectivity_indices( num_node, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00937       
00938         // calulate new coordinates for slave node
00939       assert( num_coeff > 0 );
00940       vert = coeff[0] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[0]] );
00941       for (size_t j = 1; j < num_coeff; ++j)
00942         vert += coeff[j] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[j]] );
00943 
00944         // snap vertices to domain
00945       if (domain_set()) {
00946         snap_vertex_to_domain(conn[k], err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00947       }
00948       
00949         // clear mark
00950       vert.flags() &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK;
00951     }
00952   }
00953 }
00954 
00955 void PatchData::generate_vertex_to_element_data()
00956 {
00957   MSQ_FUNCTION_TIMER( "PatchData::generate_vertex_to_element_data" );
00958   
00959     // Skip if data already exists
00960   if (!vertAdjacencyArray.empty())
00961     return;
00962     
00963     // Skip if patch is empty
00964   if (0 == num_nodes())
00965     return;
00966   
00967     // Allocate offset array
00968   vertAdjacencyOffsets.clear();
00969   vertAdjacencyOffsets.resize( num_nodes() + 1, 0 );
00970   
00971     // Temporarily use offsets array to hold per-vertex element count
00972   std::vector<MsqMeshEntity>::iterator elem_iter;
00973   const std::vector<MsqMeshEntity>::iterator elem_end = elementArray.end();
00974   for (elem_iter = elementArray.begin(); elem_iter != elem_end; ++elem_iter)
00975   {
00976     size_t* conn_iter = elem_iter->get_vertex_index_array();
00977     const size_t* conn_end = conn_iter + elem_iter->node_count();
00978     for ( ; conn_iter != conn_end; ++conn_iter )
00979       ++vertAdjacencyOffsets[*conn_iter];
00980   }
00981   
00982     // Convert counts to end indices.
00983     // When done, vertAdjacencyOffsets will contain, for each vertex,
00984     // one more than the *last* index for that vertex's data in the
00985     // adjacency array.  This is *not* the final state for this data.
00986     // See comments for next loop.
00987   std::vector<size_t>::iterator off_iter = vertAdjacencyOffsets.begin();
00988   const std::vector<size_t>::iterator off_end = vertAdjacencyOffsets.end();
00989   size_t prev = *off_iter;
00990   ++off_iter;
00991   for ( ; off_iter != off_end; ++off_iter)
00992   {
00993     prev += *off_iter;
00994     *off_iter = prev;
00995   }
00996   
00997     // Allocate space for element numbers
00998   const size_t num_vert_uses = vertAdjacencyOffsets[num_nodes()-1];
00999   assert( num_vert_uses == elemConnectivityArray.size() );
01000   vertAdjacencyArray.resize( num_vert_uses );
01001   
01002     // Fill vertAdjacencyArray, using the indices in vertAdjacencyOffsets
01003     // as the location to insert the next element number in
01004     // vertAdjacencyArray.  When done, vertAdjacenyOffsets will contain
01005     // the start index for each vertex, rather than one past the last
01006     // index.
01007   for (size_t i = 0; i < elementArray.size(); ++i)
01008   {
01009     size_t* conn_iter = elementArray[i].get_vertex_index_array();
01010     const size_t* conn_end = conn_iter + elementArray[i].node_count();
01011     for ( ; conn_iter != conn_end; ++conn_iter )
01012     {
01013       const size_t array_index = --vertAdjacencyOffsets[*conn_iter];
01014       vertAdjacencyArray[array_index] = i;
01015     }
01016   }
01017   
01018     // Last entry should be number of vertex uses (one past the
01019     // last index of the last vertex.)
01020   vertAdjacencyOffsets[num_nodes()] = num_vert_uses;
01021 }
01022 
01023 void PatchData::get_subpatch(size_t center_vertex_index,
01024                              unsigned num_adj_elem_layers,
01025                              PatchData &subpatch,
01026                              MsqError &err)
01027 {
01028   unsigned i;
01029 
01030     // Make sure we're in range
01031   if (center_vertex_index >= num_free_vertices())
01032   {
01033     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid index for center vertex",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
01034     return;
01035   }
01036   
01037     // Notify any observers of the existing subpatch that the mesh 
01038     // in the patch is to be changed.
01039   subpatch.notify_new_patch( ); 
01040 
01041     // Get list of vertices and elements in subpatch.
01042     // Ultimately, end up with arrays of unique, sorted indices.
01043     // It is important that the vertex indices be sorted so later
01044     // a reverse lookup can be done using a binary search (std::lower_bound).
01045   std::vector<size_t> elements, vertices, offsets;
01046   vertices.push_back( center_vertex_index );
01047   for (i = 0; i < num_adj_elem_layers; ++i)
01048   {
01049     elements.clear();
01050     for (unsigned v = 0; v < vertices.size(); ++v)
01051     {
01052       size_t num_elem;
01053       const size_t* vert_elems = get_vertex_element_adjacencies( vertices[v], num_elem, err );
01054       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01055       elements.insert( elements.end(), vert_elems, vert_elems + num_elem );
01056     }
01057     std::sort( elements.begin(), elements.end() );
01058     elements.erase( std::unique( elements.begin(), elements.end() ), elements.end() );
01059     
01060     vertices.clear();
01061     for (unsigned e = 0; e < elements.size(); ++e)
01062     {
01063       MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( elements[e] );
01064       size_t num_vert = elem.node_count();
01065       const size_t* elem_verts = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01066       vertices.insert( vertices.end(), elem_verts, elem_verts + num_vert );
01067     }
01068     std::sort( vertices.begin(), vertices.end() );
01069     vertices.erase( std::unique( vertices.begin(), vertices.end() ), vertices.end() );
01070   }
01071   
01072     // Allocate space for element connectivity info.
01073   size_t num_vert_uses = 0;
01074   for (i = 0; i < elements.size(); ++i)
01075     num_vert_uses += element_by_index( elements[i] ).node_count();
01076   subpatch.elementArray.resize( elements.size() );
01077   subpatch.elementHandlesArray.resize( elements.size() );
01078   subpatch.elemConnectivityArray.resize( num_vert_uses );
01079   offsets.resize( elements.size() + 1 );
01080   
01081     // Construct element connectivity data in new patch,
01082     // and copy element type into new patch
01083   size_t curr_offset = 0;
01084   for (i = 0; i < elements.size(); ++i)
01085   {
01086     MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( elements[i] );
01087     assert( i < elementArray.size() );
01088     subpatch.elementArray[i].set_element_type( elem.get_element_type() );
01089     subpatch.elementHandlesArray[i] = elementHandlesArray[elements[i]];
01090     const size_t* verts = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01091     offsets[i] = curr_offset;
01092     for (unsigned j = 0; j < elem.node_count(); ++j)
01093     {
01094       subpatch.elemConnectivityArray[curr_offset++] = 
01095         std::lower_bound( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), verts[j] )
01096         - vertices.begin();
01097     }
01098   }
01099   offsets[i] = curr_offset;
01100   
01101     // Store index in this patch in vertex handle array of subpatch
01102     // so we can determine how vertices were reordered when setting
01103     // vertex coordinates.
01104   assert(sizeof(size_t) == sizeof(void*));
01105   subpatch.vertexHandlesArray.resize( vertices.size() );
01106   size_t* vert_handles = reinterpret_cast<size_t*>(&subpatch.vertexHandlesArray[0]);
01107   std::copy( vertices.begin(), vertices.end(), vert_handles );
01108   
01109     // All vertices except vertex at center_vertex_index are fixed.
01110   subpatch.byteArray.resize( vertices.size() );
01111   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i) {
01112     if (vertices[i] == center_vertex_index)
01113       subpatch.byteArray[i] = vertexArray[vertices[i]].get_flags() & ~MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01114     else
01115       subpatch.byteArray[i] = vertexArray[vertices[i]].get_flags() | MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01116   }
01117   
01118     // Re-order vertices and initialize other data in subpatch
01119   subpatch.initialize_data( arrptr(offsets), &subpatch.byteArray[0], err ); 
01120   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01121   
01122     // Copy vertex data into subpatch.  subpatch.vertexHandlesArray contains
01123     // the indices into this PatchData for each vertex, as reordered by the
01124     // call to initialize_data.
01125   subpatch.vertexArray.resize( vertices.size() );
01126   for (i = 0; i < vertices.size(); ++i)
01127   {
01128     size_t vert_index = (size_t)(subpatch.vertexHandlesArray[i]);
01129     vertices[i] = vert_index;
01130     subpatch.vertexHandlesArray[i] = vertexHandlesArray[vert_index];
01131     subpatch.vertexArray[i] = vertexArray[vert_index];
01132     subpatch.vertexArray[i].flags() = subpatch.byteArray[i];
01133   }
01134 
01135   subpatch.myMesh = myMesh;
01136   subpatch.myDomain = myDomain;
01137   subpatch.mSettings = mSettings;
01138   
01139   notify_sub_patch( subpatch, arrptr(vertices), elements.empty() ? 0 : arrptr(elements), err ); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
01140 }
01141 
01145 void PatchData::snap_vertex_to_domain(size_t vertex_index, MsqError &err)
01146 {
01147   if (domain_set())
01148   {
01149       // if not doing normal caching or vertex is not on a single surface
01150     if (normalData.empty())
01151     {
01152       get_domain()->snap_to( vertexHandlesArray[vertex_index],
01153                              vertexArray[vertex_index] );
01154     }
01155       // entire domain is 2-D (all vertices have a single normal)
01156     else if (vertexNormalIndices.empty())
01157     {
01158       get_domain()->closest_point( vertexHandlesArray[vertex_index],
01159                                    Vector3D(vertexArray[vertex_index]),
01160                                    vertexArray[vertex_index],
01161                                    normalData[vertex_index],
01162                                    err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01163     }
01164     else if (vertexNormalIndices[vertex_index] < normalData.size()) 
01165     { // vertex has a unique normal
01166       get_domain()->closest_point( vertexHandlesArray[vertex_index],
01167                                    Vector3D(vertexArray[vertex_index]),
01168                                    vertexArray[vertex_index],
01169                                    normalData[vertexNormalIndices[vertex_index]],
01170                                    err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01171     }
01172     else 
01173     { // vertex has multiple normals
01174       get_domain()->snap_to( vertexHandlesArray[vertex_index],
01175                              vertexArray[vertex_index] );
01176     }
01177   }
01178 }
01179 
01180 
01181 void PatchData::update_cached_normals( MsqError& err )
01182 {
01183   size_t i;
01184   
01185   MeshDomain* domain = get_domain();
01186   if (!domain)
01187   {
01188     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01189     return;
01190   }
01191   
01192     // Determine which vertices lie on surfaces
01193   vertexDomainDOF.resize( num_nodes() );
01194   domain->domain_DoF( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray), arrptr(vertexDomainDOF), num_nodes(), err );
01195   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01196   
01197     // Count how many vertices have a single normal
01198   // Sun doesn't support partial template specialization, so can't use std::count
01199   //size_t n = std::count( vertexDomainDOF.begin(), vertexDomainDOF.end(), 2 );
01200   size_t n = 0;
01201   std::vector<unsigned short>::iterator k;
01202   for ( k = vertexDomainDOF.begin(); k != vertexDomainDOF.end(); ++k)
01203     if (*k == 2)
01204       ++n;
01205   
01206   normalData.resize( n );
01207   
01208     // If all vertices are on a surface, pass in the existing handles array
01209     // and store a single normal per vertex.
01210   if (n == num_nodes())
01211   {
01212     std::copy( vertexArray.begin(), vertexArray.end(), normalData.begin() );
01213     domain->vertex_normal_at( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray), arrptr(normalData), num_nodes(), err );
01214     vertexNormalIndices.clear();
01215     vertexDomainDOF.clear();
01216     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01217   }
01218   else 
01219   {
01220     vertexNormalIndices.resize( num_nodes() );
01221     size_t nn = 0;
01222     for (i = 0; i < num_nodes(); ++i) {
01223       if (vertexDomainDOF[i] == 2) {
01224         normalData[nn] = vertexArray[i];
01225         domain->vertex_normal_at( vertexHandlesArray[i], normalData[nn] );
01226         vertexNormalIndices[i] = nn;
01227         ++nn;
01228       }
01229       else {
01230         vertexNormalIndices[i] = n+1;
01231       }
01232     }
01233     assert( nn == n );
01234   }
01235 }
01236 
01237 
01238 void PatchData::get_domain_normal_at_element(size_t elem_index,
01239                                              Vector3D &surf_norm,
01240                                              MsqError &err)
01241 {
01242     // check if element as a mid-face node
01243   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( elem_index );
01244   const int mid_node = TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( 
01245                                                elem.get_element_type(),
01246                                                elem.node_count(),
01247                                                2, 0, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01248     // if we have the mid-element vertex, get cached normal for it
01249   if (mid_node > 0) {
01250       get_domain_normal_at_vertex( elem.get_vertex_index_array()[mid_node],
01251                                    elementHandlesArray[elem_index],
01252                                    surf_norm, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01253   }
01254     // otherwise query domain for normal at element centroid
01255   else if(domain_set()) {    
01256     assert(elem_index < elementArray.size());
01257     elementArray[elem_index].get_centroid(surf_norm, *this, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01258     get_domain()->element_normal_at( elementHandlesArray[elem_index], surf_norm );
01259   }
01260   else
01261     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01262 }
01263 
01264 
01265 void PatchData::get_domain_normal_at_mid_edge( size_t elem_index,
01266                                                unsigned edge_num,
01267                                                Vector3D& normal,
01268                                                MsqError& err )
01269 {
01270     // check if element as a mid-edge node
01271   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( elem_index );
01272   const int mid_node = TopologyInfo::higher_order_from_side( 
01273                                                elem.get_element_type(),
01274                                                elem.node_count(),
01275                                                1, edge_num, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01276     // if we have the mid-edge vertex, get cached normal for it
01277   if (mid_node > 0) {
01278     get_domain_normal_at_vertex( elem.get_vertex_index_array()[mid_node],
01279                                  elementHandlesArray[elem_index],
01280                                  normal, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01281   }
01282     // otherwise query domain for normal at center of edge
01283   else if (domain_set()) {
01284     const unsigned* edge = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( elem.get_element_type(),
01285                                                         edge_num, err );
01286                                                         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01287     const MsqVertex& v1 = vertex_by_index( elem.get_vertex_index_array()[edge[0]] );
01288     const MsqVertex& v2 = vertex_by_index( elem.get_vertex_index_array()[edge[1]] );
01289     normal = 0.5 * (v1 + v2);
01290     get_domain()->element_normal_at( elementHandlesArray[elem_index], normal );
01291   
01292   }
01293   else {
01294     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01295     return;
01296   }
01297 }
01298 
01299 void PatchData::get_domain_normals_at_corners( size_t elem_index,
01300                                                Vector3D normals_out[],
01301                                                MsqError& err ) 
01302 {
01303   if (!domain_set())
01304   {
01305     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01306     return;
01307   }
01308   
01309   assert(elem_index < elementArray.size());
01310   if (2 != TopologyInfo::dimension( elementArray[elem_index].get_element_type() ))
01311   {
01312     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Attempt to get corners of non-surface element", MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
01313     return;
01314   }
01315   
01316   if (normalData.empty())
01317   {
01318     update_cached_normals( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01319   }
01320   
01321   MsqMeshEntity& elem = elementArray[elem_index];
01322   const unsigned count = elem.vertex_count();
01323   const size_t* const vertex_indices = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01324   for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
01325   {
01326     const size_t v = vertex_indices[i];
01327     if (vertexNormalIndices.empty())
01328     {
01329       normals_out[i] = normalData[v];
01330     }
01331     else if(vertexNormalIndices[v] < normalData.size())
01332     {
01333       normals_out[i] = normalData[vertexNormalIndices[v]];
01334     }
01335     else
01336     {
01337       normals_out[i] = vertexArray[v];
01338       get_domain()->element_normal_at( elementHandlesArray[elem_index], normals_out[i] );
01339     }
01340   }
01341 }  
01342 
01343 void PatchData::get_domain_normal_at_vertex( size_t vert_index,
01344                                              Mesh::EntityHandle handle,
01345                                              Vector3D& normal,
01346                                              MsqError& err )
01347 {
01348   if (!domain_set())
01349   {
01350     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "No domain constraint set.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01351     return;
01352   }
01353 
01354   
01355   if (normalData.empty())
01356   {
01357     update_cached_normals( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01358   }
01359   
01360   if (vertexNormalIndices.empty())
01361   {
01362     normal = normalData[vert_index];
01363   }
01364   else if(vertexNormalIndices[vert_index] < normalData.size())
01365   {
01366     normal = normalData[vertexNormalIndices[vert_index]];
01367   }
01368   else
01369   {
01370     normal = vertexArray[vert_index];
01371     get_domain()->element_normal_at( handle, normal );
01372   }
01373 }
01374 
01375 void PatchData::get_domain_normal_at_corner( size_t elem_index,
01376                                              unsigned corner,
01377                                              Vector3D& normal,
01378                                              MsqError& err ) 
01379 {
01380   assert(elem_index < elementArray.size());
01381   if (2 != TopologyInfo::dimension( elementArray[elem_index].get_element_type() ))
01382   {
01383     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Attempt to get corners of non-surface element", MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
01384     return;
01385   }
01386 
01387   MsqMeshEntity& elem = elementArray[elem_index];
01388   const size_t* const vertex_indices = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01389   get_domain_normal_at_vertex( vertex_indices[corner],
01390                                elementHandlesArray[elem_index],
01391                                normal, err );
01392   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
01393 }
01394   
01395 
01396 void PatchData::set_mesh(Mesh* ms)        
01397 { 
01398   myMesh = ms; 
01399     // observers should treat this the same as if the
01400     // instance of this object wzs being deleted.
01401   notify_patch_destroyed();
01402 }
01403 
01404 void PatchData::set_domain(MeshDomain* d) 
01405 { 
01406   myDomain = d;
01407   
01408     // clear all cached data from the previous domain
01409   vertexNormalIndices.clear();
01410   normalData.clear();
01411   //vertexDomainDOF.clear();
01412 
01413     // observers should treat this the same as if the
01414     // instance of this object wzs being deleted.
01415   notify_patch_destroyed();
01416 }
01417 
01418 static int width( double d )
01419 {
01420   if (d == 0.0)
01421     return 1;
01422   const int max_precision = 6;
01423   int w = (int)ceil(log10(0.001+fabs(d)));
01424   if (w < 0) 
01425     w = 2 + std::min(max_precision,-w);
01426   if (d < 0.0)
01427     ++w;
01428   return w;
01429 }
01430 static int width( size_t t )
01431   { return t ? (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+t))) : 1; }
01432 static int width( const void* ptr)
01433   { return width((size_t)ptr); }
01434 
01435 ostream& operator<<( ostream& stream, const PatchData& pd )
01436 {
01437    size_t i;
01438    int fw = 5; // width of bit flags
01439    int hw = 6; // width of a handle
01440    int cw = 4; // with of a coordinate value
01441    int iw = 3; // with of an index
01442    int tw = 3; // with of the string name of an element type
01443    int xw = cw, yw = cw, zw = cw;
01444    
01445    for (i = 0; i < pd.num_nodes(); ++i) {
01446      int w = 2+width(pd.vertexHandlesArray[i]);
01447      if (w > hw)
01448        hw = w;
01449      w = width(pd.vertexArray[i].x());
01450      if (w > xw)
01451        xw = w;
01452      w = width(pd.vertexArray[i].y());
01453      if (w > yw)
01454        yw = w;
01455      w = width(pd.vertexArray[i].z());
01456      if (w > zw)
01457        zw = w;
01458    }
01459    for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); ++i) {
01460      int w = 2+width(pd.elementHandlesArray[i]);
01461      if (w > hw)
01462        hw = w;
01463      const char* name = TopologyInfo::short_name(pd.elementArray[i].get_element_type());
01464      if (name && (int)strlen(name) > tw)
01465        tw = strlen(name);
01466    }
01467    if (iw < (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+pd.num_nodes()))))
01468      iw = (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+pd.num_nodes())));
01469    if (iw < (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+pd.num_elements()))))
01470      iw = (int)ceil(log10((double)(1+pd.num_elements())));
01471     
01472    
01473    stream << "Vertices: " << endl;
01474    stream << "Flags: C: culled, F: fixed, S: slave, P: patch vertex, M: marked" << endl;
01475    stream << setw(iw) << "Idx"    << " " 
01476           << setw(hw) << "Handle" << " "
01477           << setw(cw) << "X"      << ","
01478           << setw(cw) << "Y"      << ","
01479           << setw(cw) << "Z"      << " "
01480           << setw(fw) << "Flags"  << " "
01481           <<             "Adj.Elems" << endl
01482           << setw(iw) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01483           << setw(hw) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01484           << setw(cw) << setfill('-') << "" << ","
01485           << setw(cw) << setfill('-') << "" << ","
01486           << setw(cw) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01487           << setw(fw) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01488           << setfill(' ') << "-------------" << std::endl;
01489    for (i = 0; i < pd.num_nodes(); ++i)
01490    {
01491       stream << setw(iw) << i << " " 
01492              << setw(hw) << pd.vertexHandlesArray[i] << " " 
01493              << setw(cw) << pd.vertexArray[i].x() << ","
01494              << setw(cw) << pd.vertexArray[i].y() << ","
01495              << setw(cw) << pd.vertexArray[i].z() << " ";
01496       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_CULLED ))
01497         stream << "C";
01498       else 
01499         stream << " ";
01500       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED ))
01501         stream << "F";
01502       else 
01503         stream << " ";
01504       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT ))
01505         stream << "S";
01506       else 
01507         stream << " ";
01508       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED ))
01509         stream << "f";
01510       else 
01511         stream << " ";
01512       if (pd.vertexArray[i].is_flag_set( MsqVertex::MSQ_MARK ))
01513         stream << "M";
01514       else 
01515         stream << " ";
01516       
01517       if (pd.vertAdjacencyArray.size())
01518       {
01519         size_t j = pd.vertAdjacencyOffsets[i];
01520         size_t end = pd.vertAdjacencyOffsets[i+1];
01521         if (j != end) 
01522           stream << " " << pd.vertAdjacencyArray[j++];
01523         for ( ; j < end; ++j )
01524           stream << "," << pd.vertAdjacencyArray[j];
01525       }
01526       
01527       stream << endl;
01528    }
01529    
01530    stream << "Elements: " << endl;
01531    stream << setw(iw)   << "Idx"    << " "
01532           << setw(hw)   << "Handle" << " "
01533           << setw(tw+2) << "Type"   << " "
01534           <<             "Connectivity" << std::endl
01535           << setw(iw)   << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01536           << setw(hw)   << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01537           << setw(tw+2) << setfill('-') << "" << " "
01538           << setfill(' ') << "--------------------------" << std::endl;
01539    for (i = 0; i < pd.num_elements(); ++i)
01540    {
01541       EntityTopology type = pd.elementArray[i].get_element_type();
01542       stream << setw(iw) << i << " " 
01543              << setw(hw) << pd.elementHandlesArray[i] << " "
01544              << setw(tw) << TopologyInfo::short_name(type) << left
01545              << setw(2)  << pd.elementArray[i].node_count() << internal << " "
01546              << setw(iw) << pd.elementArray[i].get_vertex_index_array()[0];
01547       for (size_t j = 1; j < pd.elementArray[i].node_count(); ++j)
01548         stream << "," << setw(iw) << pd.elementArray[i].get_vertex_index_array()[j];
01549       stream << endl;
01550    }
01551    stream << endl;
01552    
01553    stream << "Mesh: " << (pd.myMesh?"yes":"no") << endl;
01554    stream << "Domain: " << (pd.myDomain?"yes":"no") << endl;
01555 //   stream << "mType: " << (pd.mType==PatchData::VERTICES_ON_VERTEX_PATCH?"vert-on-vert":
01556 //                           pd.mType==PatchData::ELEMENTS_ON_VERTEX_PATCH?"elem-on-vert":
01557 //                           pd.mType==PatchData::GLOBAL_PATCH?"global":"unknown") << endl;
01558    
01559    if (pd.haveComputedInfos)
01560    {
01561      stream << "ComputedInfos:" << endl;
01562      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA))
01563        stream << "\t MIN_UNSINGED_AREA = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MIN_UNSIGNED_AREA] << endl;
01564      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA))
01565        stream << "\t MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MAX_UNSIGNED_AREA] << endl;
01566      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MIN_EDGE_LENGTH))
01567        stream << "\t MIN_EDGE_LENGTH = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MIN_EDGE_LENGTH] << endl;
01568      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MAX_EDGE_LENGTH))
01569        stream << "\t MAX_EDGE_LENGTH = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MAX_EDGE_LENGTH] << endl;
01570      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MINMAX_SIGNED_DET2D))
01571        stream << "\t MINMAX_SIGNED_DET2D = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MINMAX_SIGNED_DET2D] << endl;
01572      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::MINMAX_SIGNED_DET3D))
01573        stream << "\t MINMAX_SIGNED_DET3D = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::MINMAX_SIGNED_DET3D] << endl;
01574      if (pd.have_computed_info(PatchData::AVERAGE_DET3D))
01575        stream << "\t AVERAGE_DET3D = " << pd.computedInfos[PatchData::AVERAGE_DET3D] << endl;
01576   }
01577   
01578   return stream << endl;
01579 }
01580 
01581 void print_patch_data( const PatchData& pd )
01582 {
01583   std::cout << pd << std::endl;
01584 }
01585 
01586 void PatchData::enslave_higher_order_nodes( const size_t* elem_offset_array,
01587                                             unsigned char* vertex_flags,
01588                                             MsqError& err ) const
01589 {
01590   for (size_t i = 0; i < elementArray.size(); ++i)
01591   {
01592     size_t start = elem_offset_array[i];
01593     size_t conn_len = elem_offset_array[i+1] - start;
01594     for (size_t j = elementArray[i].vertex_count(); j < conn_len; ++j) {
01595       const size_t vert_idx = elemConnectivityArray[start+j];
01596       assert(vert_idx < vertexHandlesArray.size());
01597       if (!(vertex_flags[vert_idx]&MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED))
01598         vertex_flags[vert_idx] |= MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT;
01599     }
01600   }
01601 }
01602 
01603 void PatchData::initialize_data( size_t* elem_offset_array, 
01604                                  unsigned char* vertex_flags,
01605                                  MsqError& err )
01606 {
01607     // Clear out data specific to patch
01608   vertexNormalIndices.clear();
01609   normalData.clear();
01610   //vertexDomainDOF.clear();
01611   
01612     // Clear any vertex->element adjacency data.  It
01613     // is probably invalid, and certainly will be by the time
01614     // this function completes if the mesh contains higher-order
01615     // elements.
01616   vertAdjacencyArray.clear();
01617   vertAdjacencyOffsets.clear();
01618   size_t i, j;
01619   for (i = 0; i < elementArray.size(); ++i)
01620   {
01621     size_t start = elem_offset_array[i];
01622     size_t conn_len = elem_offset_array[i+1] - start;
01623     assert(conn_len > 0);
01624     elementArray[i].set_connectivity( &elemConnectivityArray[start], conn_len );
01625   }
01626      
01627     // Use vertAdjacencyOffsets array as temporary storage.
01628   vertAdjacencyOffsets.resize( vertexHandlesArray.size() + 1 );
01629   size_t* vertex_index_map = arrptr(vertAdjacencyOffsets);
01630   
01631     // Count number of free vertices and initialize vertex_index_map
01632   numFreeVertices = 0;
01633   for (i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i) {
01634     if (!(vertex_flags[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_FIXED))
01635       ++numFreeVertices;
01636     vertex_index_map[i] = i;
01637   }
01638   
01639     // Re-order vertices such that all free vertices are
01640     // first in the list.  Construct map from old to new
01641     // position in list for updating element connectivity.
01642   i = 0;
01643   j = numFreeVertices;
01644   for (;; ++i, ++j) {
01645       // find next fixed vertex in the range [i,numFreeVertices)
01646     for (; i < numFreeVertices && !(vertex_flags[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_FIXED); ++i);
01647       // if no more fixed vertices in the free vertex range [0,numFreeVertices)
01648     if (i == numFreeVertices)
01649       break;
01650       // find the next free vertex in the range [j,num_nodes)
01651     for ( ; vertex_flags[j] & MsqVertex::MSQ_FIXED; ++j);
01652       // swap fixed (i) and free (j) vertices
01653     vertex_index_map[i] = j;
01654     vertex_index_map[j] = i;
01655     std::swap( vertexHandlesArray[i], vertexHandlesArray[j] );
01656     std::swap( vertex_flags[i], vertex_flags[j] );
01657   }
01658   assert( i == numFreeVertices );
01659   assert( j <= vertexHandlesArray.size() );
01660   
01661     // Update element connectivity data for new vertex indices
01662   for (i = 0; i < elemConnectivityArray.size(); ++i)
01663     elemConnectivityArray[i] = vertex_index_map[elemConnectivityArray[i]];
01664   
01665     // Reorder vertices such that free, slave vertices
01666     // occur after free, non-slave vertices in list.
01667   numSlaveVertices = 0;
01668   for (i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i) {
01669     if ((vertex_flags[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT) && 
01670        !(vertex_flags[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_FIXED))
01671       ++numSlaveVertices;
01672   }
01673   numFreeVertices -= numSlaveVertices;
01674 
01675   if (numSlaveVertices) {
01676       // re-initialize vertex index map
01677     for (i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i)
01678       vertex_index_map[i] = i;
01679 
01680       // Re-order free vertices such that all slave vertices are
01681       // last in the list.  Construct map from old to new
01682       // position in list for updating element connectivity.
01683     i = 0;
01684     j = numFreeVertices;
01685     for (;; ++i, ++j) {
01686         // find next slave vertex in the range [i,numFreeVertices)
01687       for (; i < numFreeVertices && !(vertex_flags[i]&MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT); ++i);
01688         // if no more slave vertices in [0,numFreeVertices), then done.
01689       if (i == numFreeVertices)
01690         break;
01691         // find the next free (non-slave) vertex in the range 
01692         //   [numFreeVertices,numFreeVertices+numSlaveVertices)
01693       for ( ; vertex_flags[j] & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT; ++j);
01694         // swap free (j) and slave (i) vertices
01695       vertex_index_map[i] = j;
01696       vertex_index_map[j] = i;
01697       std::swap( vertexHandlesArray[i], vertexHandlesArray[j] );
01698       std::swap( vertex_flags[i], vertex_flags[j] );
01699     }
01700     assert( i == numFreeVertices );
01701     assert( j <= numFreeVertices + numSlaveVertices );
01702 
01703       // Update element connectivity data for new vertex indices
01704     for (i = 0; i < elemConnectivityArray.size(); ++i)
01705       elemConnectivityArray[i] = vertex_index_map[elemConnectivityArray[i]];
01706   }
01707   
01708     // Clear temporary data    
01709   vertAdjacencyOffsets.clear();
01710   
01711   notify_new_patch( );
01712 }
01713 
01714 size_t PatchData::num_corners() const
01715 {
01716   size_t result = 0;
01717   for (unsigned i = 0; i < elementArray.size(); ++i)
01718     result += elementArray[i].vertex_count();
01719   return result;
01720 }
01721 
01722 
01723 void PatchData::fill( size_t num_vertex, const double* coords,
01724                       size_t num_elem, EntityTopology type, 
01725                       const size_t* connectivity,
01726                       const bool* fixed, 
01727                       MsqError& err )
01728 {
01729   std::vector<EntityTopology> types(num_elem);
01730   std::fill( types.begin(), types.end(), type );
01731   const EntityTopology* type_ptr = num_elem ? arrptr(types) : 0;
01732   this->fill( num_vertex, coords, num_elem, type_ptr, connectivity, fixed, err );
01733   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
01734 }
01735   
01736     
01737 void PatchData::fill( size_t num_vertex, const double* coords,
01738                       size_t num_elem, const EntityTopology* types,
01739                       const size_t* conn,
01740                       const bool* fixed, 
01741                       MsqError& err )
01742 {
01743   std::vector<size_t> lengths( num_elem );
01744   std::transform( types, types + num_elem, lengths.begin(), 
01745                       std::ptr_fun(TopologyInfo::corners) );
01746   const size_t* len_ptr = num_elem ? arrptr(lengths) : 0;
01747   this->fill( num_vertex, coords, num_elem, types, len_ptr, conn, fixed, err );
01748   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
01749 } 
01750     
01751 void PatchData::fill( size_t num_vertex, const double* coords,
01752                       size_t num_elem, const EntityTopology* types,
01753                       const size_t* lengths,
01754                       const size_t* conn,
01755                       const bool* fixed,
01756                       MsqError& err )
01757 {
01758   size_t i;
01759   
01760     // count vertex uses
01761   size_t num_uses = std::accumulate( lengths, lengths + num_elem, 0 );
01762 
01763     // Allocate storage for data
01764   vertexArray.resize( num_vertex );
01765   vertexHandlesArray.resize( num_vertex );
01766   elementArray.resize( num_elem );
01767   elementHandlesArray.resize( num_elem );
01768   elemConnectivityArray.resize( num_uses );
01769   numFreeVertices = 0;
01770   numSlaveVertices = 0;
01771   
01772   // Must call clear() first so that any stale values get
01773   // zero'd when we call resize.
01774   byteArray.clear();
01775   if (fixed) {
01776     byteArray.resize( num_vertex, 0 );
01777     for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
01778       if (fixed[i])
01779         byteArray[i] |= (MsqVertex::MSQ_HARD_FIXED|MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED);
01780   }
01781   
01782   for (i = 0; i < num_elem; ++i) {
01783     element_by_index(i).set_element_type( types[i] );
01784     elementHandlesArray[i] = (Mesh::ElementHandle)i;
01785   }
01786   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
01787     vertexHandlesArray[i] = (Mesh::VertexHandle)i;
01788   
01789   memcpy( get_connectivity_array(), conn, num_uses * sizeof(size_t) );
01790   
01791   std::vector<size_t> offsets( num_elem + 1 );
01792   size_t sum = offsets[0] = 0;
01793   for (i = 1; i <= num_elem; ++i)
01794     offsets[i] = sum += lengths[i-1];
01795   
01796   const Settings::HigherOrderSlaveMode ho_mode = mSettings ? mSettings->get_slaved_ho_node_mode() : Settings::SLAVE_ALL;
01797   switch (ho_mode) {
01798   case Settings::SLAVE_ALL:
01799     byteArray.resize( num_vertex, 0 );
01800     enslave_higher_order_nodes( arrptr(offsets), arrptr(byteArray), err );  
01801     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01802     break;
01803   case Settings::SLAVE_NONE:
01804       // Do nothing.  We clear other bits when processing the 'fixed' array above.
01805     break;
01806   default:
01807     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Specified higher-order noded slaving scheme not supported "
01808                     "when initializind PatchData using PatchData::fill",
01809                     MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
01810     return;
01811   }
01812   
01813   this->initialize_data( arrptr(offsets), arrptr(byteArray), err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01814   
01815     // initialize_data will re-order vertex handles and
01816     // update element connectivity accordingly.  Use
01817     // the values we stored in vertexHandlesArray to
01818     // figure out the new index of each vertex, and initialize
01819     // the vertex.
01820   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i) 
01821     vertexArray[i] = coords + 3*(size_t)vertexHandlesArray[i];
01822   
01823   for (i = 0; i < num_vertex; ++i)
01824     vertexArray[i].flags() = byteArray[i];
01825 }
01826   
01827 void PatchData::make_handles_unique( Mesh::EntityHandle* handles,
01828                                      size_t& count,
01829                                      size_t* index_map )
01830 {
01831   if (count < 2)
01832   {
01833     return;
01834   }
01835     // save this now, as we'll be changing count later
01836   const size_t* index_end = index_map + count;
01837   
01838   if (index_map)
01839   {
01840       // Copy input handle list into index map as a temporary
01841       // copy of the input list.
01842     assert( sizeof(Mesh::EntityHandle) == sizeof(size_t) );
01843     memcpy( index_map, handles, count*sizeof(size_t) );
01844   }
01845 
01846     // Make handles a unique list
01847   std::sort( handles, handles + count );
01848   Mesh::EntityHandle* end = std::unique( handles, handles + count );
01849   count = end - handles;
01850 
01851   if (index_map)
01852   {
01853       // Replace each handle in index_map with the index of
01854       // its position in the handles array
01855     Mesh::EntityHandle* pos;
01856     for (size_t* iter = index_map; iter != index_end; ++iter)
01857     {
01858       pos = std::lower_bound( handles, handles + count, (Mesh::EntityHandle)*iter );
01859       *iter = pos - handles;
01860     }
01861   }
01862 }
01863 
01864 void PatchData::fill_global_patch( MsqError& err )
01865 {
01866   GlobalPatch gp;
01867   gp.set_mesh( get_mesh() );
01868   PatchIterator iter( &gp );
01869   bool b = iter.get_next_patch( *this, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01870   if (!b) 
01871     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Empty patch in PatchData::fill_global_patch",MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
01872   assert(b);
01873 }
01874 
01875 void PatchData::set_mesh_entities( 
01876                           std::vector<Mesh::ElementHandle>& elements,
01877                           std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>& free_vertices,
01878                           MsqError& err )
01879 {
01880   if (!get_mesh()) {
01881     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No Mesh associated with PatchData.", MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
01882     return;
01883   }
01884   
01885   if (elements.empty()) {
01886     clear();
01887     return;
01888   }
01889   
01890   elementHandlesArray = elements;
01891   get_mesh()->elements_get_attached_vertices( arrptr(elementHandlesArray),
01892                                               elementHandlesArray.size(),
01893                                               vertexHandlesArray,
01894                                               offsetArray,
01895                                               err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01896   
01897     // Construct CSR-rep element connectivity data
01898   size_t num_vert = vertexHandlesArray.size();
01899   elemConnectivityArray.resize( num_vert );
01900   make_handles_unique( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray), 
01901                        num_vert, 
01902                        arrptr(elemConnectivityArray) ); 
01903   vertexHandlesArray.resize( num_vert );
01904 
01905     // Get element topologies
01906   std::vector<EntityTopology> elem_topologies(elementHandlesArray.size());
01907   get_mesh()->elements_get_topologies( arrptr(elementHandlesArray),
01908                                        arrptr(elem_topologies),
01909                                        elementHandlesArray.size(),
01910                                        err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01911   
01912     // get vertex bits from mesh
01913   byteArray.resize( vertexHandlesArray.size() );
01914   get_mesh()->vertices_get_byte( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray), 
01915                                  arrptr(byteArray), 
01916                                  vertexHandlesArray.size(), 
01917                                  err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01918   
01919     // if free_vertices is not empty, then we need to mark as
01920     // fixed any vertices *not* in that list.
01921   if (free_vertices.size() == 1) {
01922     for (size_t i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i)
01923       if (vertexHandlesArray[i] == free_vertices.front())
01924         byteArray[i] &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01925       else
01926         byteArray[i] |= MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01927   }
01928   else if (!free_vertices.empty()){
01929       // sort and remove duplicates from free_vertices list.
01930     std::sort(free_vertices.begin(), free_vertices.end());
01931     free_vertices.erase( 
01932         std::unique(free_vertices.begin(), free_vertices.end()), 
01933         free_vertices.end() );
01934     
01935     for (size_t i = 0; i < vertexHandlesArray.size(); ++i) {
01936       if ((byteArray[i] & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT) ||
01937           std::binary_search(free_vertices.begin(), free_vertices.end(), vertexHandlesArray[i]))
01938         byteArray[i] &= ~MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01939       else
01940         byteArray[i] |= MsqVertex::MSQ_PATCH_FIXED;
01941     }
01942   }
01943 
01944     // set element types
01945   elementArray.resize( elementHandlesArray.size() );
01946   for (size_t i = 0; i < elementHandlesArray.size(); ++i)
01947     elementArray[i].set_element_type( elem_topologies[i] );
01948   
01949     // get element connectivity, group vertices by free/slave/fixed state
01950   initialize_data( arrptr(offsetArray), arrptr(byteArray), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01951   
01952     // get vertex coordinates
01953   vertexArray.resize( vertexHandlesArray.size() );
01954   get_mesh()->vertices_get_coordinates( arrptr(vertexHandlesArray),
01955                                     arrptr(vertexArray),
01956                                     vertexHandlesArray.size(),
01957                                     err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01958 
01959     // set vertex flags
01960   for (size_t i = 0; i < vertexArray.size(); ++i)
01961     vertexArray[i].flags() = byteArray[i];
01962 }
01963 
01964 
01965 void PatchData::get_sample_location( size_t element_index,
01966                                      Sample sample,
01967                                      Vector3D& result,
01968                                      MsqError& err ) const
01969 {
01970   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index( element_index );
01971   const NodeSet ho_bits = non_slave_node_set( element_index );
01972   const MappingFunction* const f = get_mapping_function( elem.get_element_type() );
01973   if (!f) {
01974     MSQ_SETERR(err)("No mapping function", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
01975     return;
01976   }
01977   
01978   double coeff[27];
01979   size_t num_coeff, index[27];
01980   f->coefficients( sample, ho_bits, coeff, index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN( err );
01981   f->convert_connectivity_indices( elem.node_count(), index, num_coeff, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01982   
01983   const size_t* const conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01984   assert( num_coeff > 0 );
01985   result = coeff[0] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[0]] );
01986   for (unsigned i = 1; i < num_coeff; ++i) 
01987     result += coeff[i] * vertex_by_index( conn[index[i]] );
01988 }
01989 
01990 
01991 NodeSet PatchData::non_slave_node_set( size_t element_index ) const
01992 {
01993   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = element_by_index(element_index);
01994   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
01995   const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
01996   const size_t n = elem.node_count();
01997 
01998   MsqError err;
01999   bool have_midedge, have_midface, have_midelem;
02000   unsigned num_edge = 0, num_face = 0, num_corner = TopologyInfo::corners(type);
02001   TopologyInfo::higher_order( type, n, have_midedge, have_midface, have_midelem, err );
02002   num_edge = TopologyInfo::edges(type);
02003   if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) == 2)
02004     num_face = 1;
02005   else 
02006     num_face = TopologyInfo::faces(type);
02007   
02008   NodeSet result;
02009   result.set_all_corner_nodes(type);
02010   if (have_midedge) {
02011     for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_edge; ++i) {
02012       if (!(vertex_by_index(conn[num_corner+i]).get_flags() & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT))
02013         result.set_mid_edge_node(i);
02014     }
02015   }
02016   if (have_midface) {
02017     for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_face; ++i) {
02018       if (!(vertex_by_index(conn[num_corner+num_edge+i]).get_flags() & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT))
02019         result.set_mid_face_node(i);
02020     }
02021   }
02022   if (have_midelem && !(vertex_by_index(conn[num_corner+num_edge+num_face]).get_flags() & MsqVertex::MSQ_DEPENDENT))
02023     result.set_mid_region_node();
02024 
02025   return result;
02026 }
02027 
02028 void PatchData::get_samples( size_t element, std::vector<Sample>& samples, MsqError& ) const
02029 {
02030   NodeSet ns = get_samples( element );
02031   samples.resize( ns.num_nodes() );
02032   std::vector<Sample>::iterator i = samples.begin();
02033   
02034   unsigned j;
02035   EntityTopology type = element_by_index(element).get_element_type();
02036   for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::corners(type); ++j)
02037     if (ns.corner_node(j))
02038       *(i++) = Sample( 0, j );
02039   for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::edges(type); ++j)
02040     if (ns.mid_edge_node(j))
02041       *(i++) = Sample( 1, j );
02042   if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) == 3) {
02043     for (j = 0; j < TopologyInfo::faces(type); ++j)
02044       if (ns.mid_face_node(j))
02045         *(i++) = Sample( 2, j );
02046     if (ns.mid_region_node())
02047       *(i++) = Sample( 3, 0 );
02048   }
02049   else if (ns.mid_face_node(0))
02050     *(i++) = Sample( 2, 0 );
02051     
02052   assert( i == samples.end() );
02053 }
02054 
02055 
02056 bool PatchData::attach_extra_data( ExtraData* data )
02057 {
02058   if (data->patchNext) {
02059     return false;
02060   }
02061   
02062   if (!data->patchPtr)
02063     data->patchPtr = this;
02064   else if(data->patchPtr != this)
02065     return false;
02066   
02067   data->patchNext = dataList;
02068   dataList = data;
02069   return true;
02070 }
02071 
02072 bool PatchData::remove_extra_data( ExtraData* data )
02073 {
02074   if (data->patchPtr != this)
02075     return false;
02076   
02077   if (dataList == data) {
02078     dataList = data->patchNext;
02079     data->patchNext = 0;
02080     data->patchPtr = 0;
02081     return true;
02082   }
02083   
02084   for (ExtraData* iter = dataList; iter; iter = iter->patchNext)
02085     if (iter->patchNext == data) {
02086       iter->patchNext = data->patchNext;
02087       data->patchNext = 0;
02088       data->patchPtr = 0;
02089       return true;
02090     }
02091   
02092   return false;
02093 }
02094 
02095 void PatchData::notify_new_patch()
02096 {
02097   for (ExtraData* iter = dataList; iter; iter = iter->patchNext)
02098     iter->notify_new_patch();
02099 }
02100 
02101 void PatchData::notify_sub_patch( PatchData& sub_patch,
02102                                   const size_t* vertex_map,
02103                                   const size_t* element_map,
02104                                   MsqError& err )
02105 {
02106   for (ExtraData* iter = dataList; iter; iter = iter->patchNext)
02107   {
02108     iter->notify_sub_patch( sub_patch, vertex_map, element_map, err );
02109     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02110   }
02111 }
02112 
02113 void PatchData::notify_patch_destroyed()
02114 {
02115     // Remove all ExtraDatas from list and notify them
02116     // that they are being destroyed.
02117   while( dataList ) {
02118     ExtraData* dead_data = dataList;
02119     dataList = dataList->patchNext;
02120     dead_data->patchNext = 0;
02121     dead_data->patchPtr = 0;
02122     dead_data->notify_patch_destroyed( );
02123   }
02124 }
